name: 萬聖節風格
description: 橙色與棕色主題的萬聖節配色方案
body_background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 80%, rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.15) 0%, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 80% 20%, rgba(255, 69, 0, 0.15) 0%, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 40% 40%, rgba(139, 69, 19, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%), linear-gradient(135deg, #2c1810 0%, #4a2c2a 25%, #8b4513 50%, #cd853f 75%, #daa520 100%)
body_before_background: radial-gradient(circle at 15% 25%, rgba(255, 140, 0, 0.08) 0%, transparent 25%), radial-gradient(circle at 85% 75%, rgba(255, 69, 0, 0.08) 0%, transparent 25%), radial-gradient(circle at 50% 10%, rgba(139, 69, 19, 0.05) 0%, transparent 30%)
container_background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 20%, rgba(255, 140, 0, 0.1) 0%, transparent 40%), radial-gradient(circle at 70% 80%, rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.08) 0%, transparent 35%), linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 228, 196, 0.95) 0%, rgba(255, 218, 185, 0.95) 100%)
header_background: radial-gradient(ellipse at 25% 30%, rgba(255, 69, 0, 0.15) 0%, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(ellipse at 75% 70%, rgba(255, 140, 0, 0.12) 0%, transparent 45%), linear-gradient(135deg, #cc4400, #ff6600, #ff8c00)
header_before_background: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, transparent 8px, rgba(255, 140, 0, 0.1) 8px, rgba(255, 140, 0, 0.1) 16px), repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg, transparent, transparent 12px, rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.08) 12px, rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.08) 24px)
day_cell_background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 20%, rgba(255, 228, 196, 0.3) 0%, transparent 40%), radial-gradient(circle at 80% 80%, rgba(255, 218, 185, 0.2) 0%, transparent 35%), linear-gradient(135deg, #fffaf0, #ffefd5)
today_background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, rgba(255, 140, 0, 0.4) 0%, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 70% 70%, rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.3) 0%, transparent 45%), linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffa500)
